item.title: Nordic NRF9160 Part I - Getting Started
item.description: Install 1. nRF connect chmod a+x nrfconnect361x8664.AppImage 2 J-Link Software and Documentation pack for Linux DEB installer, 64-bit Updating the DK firmware Creating an nRF Connect for Cloud account Updating the nRF Connect for Cloud certificate Connecting the DK to nRF Connect for Cloud Add sim card The device is now provisioned on nRF Connect for Cloud, but it is not yet associated with your account Add device https://devzone.nordicsemi.com/f/nordic-q-a/60229/still-working-message-on-activation-of-ibasis-sim-card

item.title: Nordic NRF52840 Storage Part II
item.description: This post is the continued talk about the persistent storage for Nordic nRF52840. In part I we went over using the Flash Data Storage (FDS) library. In this part II, I’ll be discussing another import component, user information configuration registers (UICR).
